Questions.question: Why was there great rejoicing in the city and throughout the country?
Questions.answer: The people wished their king all that was good, since he was kind and just.

Questions.question: Who entered the room while the child lay in its cradle?
What did the king do after hearing the old woman's words?
Questions.answer: He posted guards to watch over the little princess so that she would not get out under the open sky.
